= INSTAL ADMIN AND THE FIRST MODULE =

	# Create a new DB in PhpMyAdmin
	# Edit the file ./admin/lib/racine.php : $dbase , $dbhost, $dblogin (Ligne 75)
	# In this base, import default SQL ./admin/lib/_SETUP_ADMIN_CMS.SQL with PhpMyAdmin
	# Open Admin in your browser http://127.0.0.1/www.site.com/admin/
	# For each new module (ex : "mod_clients")  drop it in ./admin/ folder
	# Edit./admin/lib/racine.php : $adminMenuAdmin (Ligne 208) , your module appear in the admin menu
	# Edit the data file for custom fields in ./mod_clients/data.php
	# When ready,  decomment the last row in data.php
	# Open the module in your browser http://127.0.0.1/www.site.com/admin/mod_clients/, the table is created
	# Comment the last row in data.php
	# Admin your clients ;)
